Trade/Device Name(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
illumigene C. difficile External Control Kit
Analyte(s): Clostridium difficile DNA (PaLoc Toxin A gene fragment)
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): illumipro-10 Automated Isothermal Amplification and Detection System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Meridian Bioscience illumigene C. difficile molecular assay for qualitative detection of toxigenic C. difficile in stool using LAMP technology
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of toxigenic Clostridium difficile DNA in stool specimens from patients suspected of Clostridium difficile-associated disease, targeting regions present in all known A+B+ and A−B+ toxinotypes, intended for point-of-care use.
